name: Universal Friendship
description: Marks every Geometry Dash profile as a friend, unlocking messaging and friend interactions without touching the real list.

enable-simulation.name: Enable universal friendship
enable-simulation.description: When enabled, every profile is treated as if it is already in your friend list.

partial-mode.name: Simulate only for non-friends
partial-mode.description: Apply the simulation only to players that are not already part of the real friend list.

log-errors.name: Log profile warnings
log-errors.description: If an unexpected error occurs while patching profile UI elements, the mod will log it to the Geode console.
